title: Sasquatch
description:
Tig and Cheryl investigate Hulu's true crime/mystery doc "Sasquatch," on today's episode of True Story! Tig is a Bigfoot skeptic... while Cheryl turns out to be a stalwart squatcher (listen to the episode to find out what a "squatcher" is). Plus moon cycles, mouth guards, intimate moments with a bear, and much more! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
